name: TimePicker
description: A segmented time input component with hour, minute, and optional second/AM-PM segments

accessibility.screenReader: Each segment announces label and value. Value changes are announced. Focus navigation between segments.

recommendedUsage: Use for time entry with clear segment separation. Supports 12-hour and 24-hour formats.
antiPatterns: Do not use for date-time selection - combine with DatePicker. Avoid for duration input.
